name: CLM_ADJUD_INFO
description: This table contains claim adjudication information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the component or component group used in adjudicating this claim line.

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component index record

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the contract used in adjudicating this claim line.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: CONTRACT_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A numerical representation of the contact date for the contract used in adjudicating this claim line. Used to help link to the VEN_NET_CONT_SVC table.

columns.name: CONTRACT_LN
columns.description: The contract line number used in adjudicating this claim line.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the DRG that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: COMPONENT_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the whole claim component group that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: PROC_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text comment about the procedure that is associated with this claim line.
